dynamic_line.no: Hey bro, why the fuck are you hanging around here?

responses.text: There's no need to be so rude. Are you always this unfriendly?
I want to buy myself something, do you have anything to offer?

dynamic_line: What...? Hey, either say what you need or fuck off before your teeth fall out.

responses.text: I came for the adrenaline. Maybe you have some interesting suggestions?
I want to buy myself something, do you have anything to offer?

dynamic_line: Listen, I have something to do. Not complicated. One son of a whore needs to be killed.

responses.text: Yes, I'm ready. Tell me the details.

dynamic_line: That's great. Some asshole stole my money. Find this fucking creature. I think I last saw him in HamHamPangPang, his name is Ryan. When you're done, come back.

responses.text: Sounds interesting. I'm taking this on.
I changed my mind, I don't want to take on this matter.

dynamic_line: You better come back with good news, or don't bother showing your face again.
Then why the hell are you bothering me? Get out of here!

responses.text: Calm down. Why are you so nervous?

dynamic_line: Why? WHY!? You asked for it!!
Come back with good news? Or realised you can't keep up?

responses.text: He hadn't any money on him, and now he won't be a bother any longer.

dynamic_line: Huh. Maybe you aren't a waste of oxygen. Try these on, they might suit ya.

name.str: Find Ryan and make them pay.

dialogue.describe: Last I saw them, they were here, let me mark it.
dialogue.offer: They ain't much, don't worry. If you got skills, anyway.
dialogue.advice: The guy's not got any backup, what more advice do you need. Come back with the money, or one less idiot in th' world.
dialogue.success: Huh, I didn't think you'd actually manage. Here, these might suit y' better.
dialogue.failure: Pfah! Knew you couldn't handle it. Get lost.
